=head1 NAME

Search::Kino03::KinoSearch::Search::NoMatchQuery - Query which matches no documents.



=head1 DESCRIPTION

NoMatchQuery is a utility class representing a query which matches nothing.
Typical usage might include e.g. returning a NoMatchQuery when a
QueryParser is asked to parse an empty string.

=head1 CONSTRUCTORS

=head2 new()

    my $no_match_query = Search::Kino03::KinoSearch::Search::NoMatchQuery->new;

Constructor. Takes no arguments.







=head1 INHERITANCE

Search::Kino03::KinoSearch::Search::NoMatchQuery isa L<Search::Kino03::KinoSearch::Search::Query> isa L<Search::Kino03::KinoSearch::Obj>.
